'''Alpha v1.0.6_03'''<ref>{{ytl|_t8cqWRXNrE|Minecraft Water shoot|rswinteller|Jul 17, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 17, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:824511193|1.0.6_03, level save fix work]] – The Word of Notch, July 17, 2010</ref> to fix a game crash.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* The game no longer crashes upon loading some worlds that have corrupted <samp>[[Java Edition level format#level.dat format|level.dat]]</samp> files.</onlyinclude>
